name: cbertelegni
content:
regex para crear url a telegramas votaciones a partir de la url de un documentcloud

https://www.documentcloud.org/documents/2303954-230010001-0003

https://www.documentcloud.org/documents/2306196-230010015b0679


//implementacion JS:

DC_url.toUpperCase().replace(/.+\/[0-9]+-([0-9]{2})([0-9]{3})([0-9]{4}[a-z]?)(.+)$/i,
 "http://www.resultados.gob.ar/telegr/$1/$2/$3/$1$2$3$4.htm").replace(/\-/, "_")
 
 
 https://www.documentcloud.org/documents/2306196-230010015b0679
author: cbertelegni
